Text:
You'll get 500 .zip files. To run WinRAR auto'magically' on all to extract the .ttf files,
Run -> cmd , cd to the directory with the .zip files then at the command prompt:  
"C:\Program Files\WinRAR\WinRAR.exe" e *.zip *.ttf  
This will pull all the font files out into the same directory.
good upload, some interesting fonts, although it will take forever to go through. Glad you uploaded though, or else i would have to go through and download all 500 one-by-one
Trent, nice winrar trick.  I can't believe I got it to work on the first try. Thanks!

Nice upload.

A lot of fonts. It has a lot of other file types too, if you want to clear your dir, just sort it by .tff then delete the rest.

Thanks for the upload, fast seeding.
thanks for the winrar tip and fonts ov course
